headline: Does L3Harris (LHX) Pairing a Dividend Hike with Asset Sales Reveal Its True Capital Priorities?
summary: L3Harris Technologies recently approved a quarterly dividend increase from US$1.20 to US$1.25 per share, while reshaping its portfolio through a majority sale of its space propulsion and power systems business and preparing a separate public listing for its missile solutions unit following a US$1.00 billion Department of Defense investment. Together, the higher dividend and business realignment highlight how L3Harris is using asset sales and focused defense investments to support cash...
